question: How can I export my B.note settings to view them on the site?

answer.a: To export the setting file from your B.note, follow these steps:
b: Go to the User Interface menu and click on Export settings
Give a name to your file
Confirm, the file will be saved in the Settings folder
Go to the Settings folder via the explorer
You have 2 options, either copy the file to a USB stick or send the file via Bluetooth
answer.c: Once the file is on your computer, you just need to go to the settings management page to view the file.

question: How can I import the file to my device once it is generated?

answer.a: To apply the configuration to your device, follow these steps:
b: Send the file via Bluetooth to the B.NOTE
Go to the Bluetooth folder of the device and move the file to the Settings folder
answer.c: You can also put the file on a USB stick and open it from the stick on the B.NOTE.

question: Where can I find documentation on the B.NOTE?

answer.a: You can visit the Eurobraille website for more information on the B.NOTE.

question: How can I contribute to the site?

answer.a: You can go to the GitHub repository accessible at the bottom of the page and follow the contribution guide.
